title: LOTTE EBC #1
subtitle: Lotte Executive Briefing Center : WELCOME
desc: Our project focuses on the creation of a media space and content production that allows our VIP customers to experience the essence of LOTTE Group's values and vision. At the LOTTE Executive Briefing Center, we've designed a unique space where you can engage with the rich history, innovation, and global impact that define LOTTE Group.
content:
New Gaze spearheaded the media content creation project for the revamped LOTTE EBC on the 113th floor of LOTTE Tower.

We've designed innovative media content for two key areas:

The Welcome Zone, where we extend a warm welcome to our VIP guests.
The PR Zone, where visitors can experience LOTTE's values and vision through tailored media messages.
In the Welcome Zone, the iconic LOTTE World Tower in Seoul is transformed into a captivating and beautiful panorama through transparent displays, showcasing a vibrant array of patterns.

title: MOBIS PLATFORM
subtitle: Hyundai Mobis B to B Service Platform
